name: Seven10 Storage Software
tag_list: file-system-archive, archive, archive-software, storage-software, storfirst, storfirst-eas, storfirst-apollo, storfirst-altus, cloud-gateway, tiering, encryption, centera-backup, hcp, emc
overview: Seven10 develops and markets file system software that allows organizations of all sizes to build and grow their storage environments without worrying about storage obsolescence. With native support for Cloud Storage, disk, CAS, tape, VTL and built-in data migration capabilities, StorFirst products deliver enterprise archive and data protection software that helps organizations store data intelligently and securely. With proven success in healthcare, finance and compliance-driven markets, and an install base that includes many of today’s Fortune 500 companies, Seven10 is fast becoming one of the most trusted names in storage.
